tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.TITLE: Schema for Experimental Feeds (v1)
tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.DESCRIPTION: feeds have a $UID, $SCHEMA, TITLE, and a list of ARTICLES; in the future there will be more, but this is for the time being

tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.TITLE: Schema for Experimental Articles (v1)
tag:lionkimbro@gmail.com,2021:entity-sch.DESCRIPTION: articles have a $SCHEMA, $UID, a list of AUTHORS, an HTML link, a RAW link, a HOOK, and a POSTED date
